title: Fails to install from partially (some subdatasets missing) installed dataset
body:
Happens in both 0.5.x and master
```shell
$> datalad install -r -s /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone' to '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__' 
install(ok): /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__ (dataset)
[INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__> recursively 
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone/d0/r1' to '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__/d0/r1' 
[ERROR  ] Failed to clone data from any candidate source URL: ['/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone/d0/r1'] 
[ERROR  ] Installation of subdatasets <Dataset path=/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__/d0/r1> failed with exception: InstallFailedError: 
Failed to install dataset from: ['/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone/d0/r1'] [get.py:_install_subds_from_flexible_source:155] 
action summary:
  install (error: 1, ok: 1)
[ERROR  ] could not perform all requested actions: Command did not complete successfully [{'status': 'error', 'message': ('Installation of subdatasets %s failed with exception: %s', <Dataset path=/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__/d0/r1>, "InstallFailedError: \nFailed to install dataset from: ['/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone/d0/r1'] [get.py:_install_subds_from_flexible_source:155]"), 'action': 'install', 'path': '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__/d0/r1', 'type': 'dataset', 'refds': '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone__'}] [utils.py:generator_func:1084] 
```
where
```
$> datalad ls -r /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone
/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone/d0/r1   not installed
/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone/r0      not installed
/tmp/datalad_temp_ds_0Pc0pt_clone                   [git]  master  - 2017-05-10/10:11:27  OK
```
disregard dereferencing symlinks I guess ;)

Expected:  it would install available subdatasets and report "not possible" or whatever for the others
